io.discloader.discloader.common

Class DiscLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.common.DiscLoader

  • public class DiscLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The DiscLoader client object

    How To Use

     public static void main(String... args) {
     // create a new instance of DiscLoader
     DiscLoader loader = new DiscLoader();
 
     // make it do it's startup stuff
     loader.startup();
 
     // since it's probably done, time to login
     loader.login(TOKEN);

 }
    Author:
    Perry Berman, Zach Waldron

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscLoader

        public DiscLoader()
        The DiscLoader client object

        How To Use

         public static void main(String... args) {
     // create a new instance of DiscLoader
     DiscLoader loader = new DiscLoader();
 
     // make it do it's startup stuff
     loader.startup();
 
     // since it's probably done, time to login
     loader.login(TOKEN);

 }

      • DiscLoader

        public DiscLoader(int shards,
                  int shard)
        The DiscLoader client object

        How To Use

        Shard Manager jar

         public static void main(String... args) {
     int shards = 10;
 
     ShardManager manager = new ShardManager(shards);
     manager.start();
 
 }

        Shard jar

         // main method in shard jar
 public static void main(String... args) {
     // create a new instance of DiscLoader shard
     DiscLoader loader = new DiscLoader(System.getenv("shards"), System.getenv("shard"));
 
     // make it do it's startup stuff
     loader.startup();
 
     // since it's probably done, time to login
     loader.login(TOKEN);

 }
        Parameters:
        shards - The total number of shards
        shard - The number id of this shard
        Since:
        0.0.3

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> login(java.lang.String token)
        Connects the current instance of the loader into Discord's gateway servers
        Parameters:
        token - your API token
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture<String>

      • startup

        public void startup()
        This method must be called to start DiscLoader.
        As it begins the setup process for DiscLoader to be able to function correctly
        It will crash otherwise
        Since:
        0.0.3
